name: BotNet's Division: The Story of Kyjo Bot
name_original: BotNet's Division: The Story of Kyjo Bot
description:
Name: Kyjo Bot

Race/Ethnicity: Small Robot / Originally part of the Weapons Division

Physical Description:

Kyjo Bot like all other bot's has a small square body with rectangular arms with a Tv for a face.

Background Monologue:

Kyjo Bot, is a recently decommissioned robot who has been brought back to life with his memory core erased. Due to his memory core being wiped he doesn't remember his past life, his goal is to uncover what happened to him.

Kyjo Bot was the leader of an uprising called the Botnet Division's where each division fought over control of the BotNet, a network that connect all Bot to their life force. Its what powers and runs them. Allowing them to be sentient.

Initial Purpose/Motivation:

Kyjo Bot must learn about his environment having just had his memory core wiped, he has no clue about his surrounding, and must search for clues about his passed life and the world he is in.

Internal/External Conflict:

Kyjo Bot must decide if he should re-join the Weapons Division and continue his fight to control the Botnet or help the science division to keep the peace and start a new life.

Character Resolution:

At the end of the story if the player has talked to all the characters they should have a good idea of the backstory of the world and must make a choice weather or not to return to the character old ways or start fresh.

 -

This game was created for a University assessment using free assets from the Unity Asset Store.
